docs.lead_paragraph: THE hostess in search of novelty might give a fad party, which is as new as it may be made interesting. The invitations can be in formal notes, asking each guest present to represent her favorite fad in the way that appeals most to her. This Trill let out those who object to costume parties, and will give more originality in the representation.

headline.main: A Novel and Amusing Idea for a House Entertainment in the Holiday Season.; LITTLE LINGERIE PILLOWS.
